#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int T;
    long long int n, ans;
    scanf("%d", &T);
    while(T--){
             scanf("%lld", &n);
             if(n == 1)
                  printf("0\n");
             else{
                 if(n % 2 == 0)
                      ans = (n - 4) * (n + 2)/2 + 3 + n;
                 else
                     ans = (n + 3) * (n - 3) / 2 + 3;
                 printf("%lld\n", ans);
             }
    }
    return 0;
}
